sentence.Network_en: Were you serious, or was that a bit of tomfoolery?
sentence.Network_cn: 你是认真的呢，还是有点胡闹？

sentence.Network_en: There was a lot of tomfoolery in the class when the teacher stepped out.
sentence.Network_cn: 老师一踏出教室,教室里的蠢举就接二连三的.

sentence.Network_en: How can we stop this tomfoolery?
sentence.Network_cn: 我们怎么制止这桩蠢事 呢 ?

PerfectNetExp.abs: tomfool 傻瓜tomfoolery 愚蠢的举动tommy atkins 英国士兵
How can we stop this tomfoolery ?, 我们怎么制止这桩蠢事呢?
...tanding). 虽然如此, 他承认如果能证明婴儿没有灵性上的理解能力, 那么他们的洗礼便是一件“蠢事”(tomfoolery), 甚至是一个“亵渎”(blasphemy). 路德会(Lutheran)对婴儿洗礼的看法被圣公会采.

entry.def: Tomfoolery is playful behaviour, usually of a rather silly, noisy, or rough kind.

example.ex: Were you serious, or was that a bit of tomfoolery?
example.tran: 你是认真的呢，还是有点胡闹？

auth_sentence.content: Perhaps this is because workers have become increasingly inventive with their sick-day tomfoolery.
auth_sentence.res_content: Perhaps this is because workers have become increasingly inventive with their sick-day tomfoolery.

auth_sentence.content: Fortunately, amid the seemingly random tomfoolery there is definite method to the madness.

auth_sentence.content: Good luck on the investors in this tomfoolery ever seeing anything from their investment.
